#src.insert(2,"Average Salary",0)

#calculating avg salary
def avg_sal(x):
    x = x.replace("(Glassdoor est.)","")
    x = x.replace("$","")
    x = x.replace("K","000")
    if x.find("0-")!=-1:
        avg = (int(x.split("-")[0])+int(x.split("-")[1]))/2
    else:
        avg=0
    return avg
print(avg_sal)
source.880325f6:
job.insert(2,"Average Salary",0)
job["Average Salary"] = job["Salary Estimate"].apply(avg_sal)
